entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentStackTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakes_ForceContentionWithToArray - NullReferenceException #76141
  • 3 System.Diagnostics tests failing - System.FormatException : The input is not a valid Base-64 #76140
  • [API Proposal]: [API Proposal]: Add HTML string syntax type constant to StringSyntaxAttribute #76138
  • string.IndexOf() incorrect return value for full stop for Thai culture #76137
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Private.Xml.Tests - GENERAL_FAILURE #76134
  • [API Proposal]: Non static variants of IMultiplicativeIdentity and IAdditiveIdentity #76132
  • [Bug] System.Text.Json can't parse Json ( returned from server using Python json.dumps() ) ? #76130
  • BlockingCollection.TakeFromAny suggestion #76128
  • Incorrect string length calculation in LdapPal.Linux #76125
  • Improve `LoggerMessageGenerator` incrementality #76119
  • Segmenation fault on dotnet new console build and run #76117
  • List<T>.AddRange with erroneous input has inconsistent behavior #76116

Closed

  • version `GLIBC_2.3' not found #38916
    Future
  • Why TrimEndChars was removed? #76122
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.ComponentModel #73724
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Modify Float/Double Equals and CompareTo to reflect -0.0 and +0.0 difference and ordering #73583
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] XslCompiledTransform tests failing on devices #75699
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #76027

PullRequests

Created

  • [Bug] Fix issue #70227 #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Use make_unique instead of manually allocating a new array #76142
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • Add IR support for modeling multiple SSA definitions as one store #76139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove deprecated WebRequest from SoundPlayer.cs #76136
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't use write barriers for frozen objects #76135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable frequently failing CriticalFinalizer test #76131
  • Fix incorrect string length calculation #76127
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Update templates to work for multiple versions #76124
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Update templates to add framework argument #76123
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • docs: add missing document to microsoft.extensions.options #76121
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some math helpers in DecimalCalc #76118
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove WeakReference.m_trackResurrection field #76115
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #76113
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable failing test SignedXmlTest.VerifyXmlResolver #76129
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Delete typeof caches from CoreCLR CoreLib #76126
    area-System.Reflection
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix native aot test failures #76114
    area-System.Xml
  • SPMI: Add and utilize number of contexts with diffs #76011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add back missing conv opcodes when compiling via System.Linq.Expressions #76024
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Don't use MS.Build.NoTargets SDK for runtime tests #76107
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix impIntrinsic to not raise asserts for the AltJit scenario #76048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add workaround for msbuild issue in tests #76090
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • JIT: refactor jump threading a bit #76108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests: re-enable SIMD tests on v8, and nodejs #75742
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • perf-pipeline: Remove unnecessary jobs #76111
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Unable to build using <TargetFrameworks> tag on .NET 7 RC1 #28009
  • Custom satellite resource assembly not output when using .NET 7 RC1 #27890
  • Passing properties with multiple values stops woring with net7 RC1 - 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 #28131

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2002969 #27667

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #64268
  • Code Analysis constantly crashes (IndexOutOfRangeException) #64266

Closed

  • LSIF generation can't be interpreted by 0.6.0 validators #63840
    17.4
  • [LSP] Rename doesn't reject invalid identifiers #63556
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix preview changes not working for new inline rename #64264
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for implementation edges in our LSIF indexer #64263
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64267
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64262
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix miscellaneous LSIF indexing issues to better match the 0.6.0 spec #64256
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `using` statements. #64245
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Reject invalid identifiers for rename in LSP #64253
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add back status and error information to inline rename #64260
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64271
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64270
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64269
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 RC1 ASP.Net Core Output Caching: Memory leak in MemoryOutputCacheStore? #44169
  • `[directory]` not shown in installation bundle help #44167
  • ContentRangeHeaderValue "to" must always be less than "length" #44166
  • PWA Blazor doesn't work when I use Multiple hosted ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly apps #44164
  • Get child tag by name #44163
  • Varied Messages for Unauthorized in AuthorizeRouteView for a specific authorization policy/role #44162
  • Mapping Exception x StatusCode in ExceptionHandlerMiddleware #44156

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44160
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44158
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44161
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates to ref new 7.0 branch #44134
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-spa, feature-templates, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44152
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2002995 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44155
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor

entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The entity type requires a primary key to be defined. If you intended to use a keyless entity type, call 'HasNoKey' in 'OnModelCreating'. #29198
  • DbContext Instance gets Disposed. #29197
  • Table spitting sample in docs throws "Sequence contains no elements" from `SqlExpressionFactory` in EF7 #29196
  • Add helper class to aid building raw sql queries #29195
  • Generate SQL migration script programmatically #29193
